diff_act: 2.edit existing projects by updating project information
3.delete projects that are no longer needed from the system

regen.absent_element: detailed handling for assignment and removal of work items in project management
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide detailed validation to ensure that only valid work items are assigned to a project and facilitate correction if invalid assignments occur.

regen.absent_element: notification for assigning/removing work items to a project
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user when work items are assigned or removed from a project, detailing changes made.

regen.absent_element: user feedback mechanism for successful or unsuccessful operations
regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user of the success or failure when projects are assigned or removed from work items, or when projects are split.

label: The user shall be able to combine multiple projects into a master project.
absence: action of combining multiple projects into a master project
